content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: golden_shovel
inventory=[{"type": "ender_chest", "quantity": 55, "index": 10}, {"type": "red_nether_brick_wall", "quantity": 59, "index": 11}, {"type": "dried_kelp", "quantity": 47, "index": 12}, {"type": "blackstone_wall", "quantity": 11, "index": 13}, {"type": "stick", "quantity": 2, "index": 15}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 53, "index": 18}, {"type": "brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 22, "index": 20}, {"type": "mushroom_stew", "quantity": 1, "index": 21}, {"type": "light_blue_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 24}, {"type": "pink_tulip", "quantity": 3, "index": 26}, {"type": "gold_block", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "birch_trapdoor", "quantity": 31, "index": 31}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 9, "index": 33}, {"type": "pink_stained_glass_pane", "quantity": 25, "index": 38}, {"type": "oxeye_daisy", "quantity": 36, "index": 41}, {"type": "lime_banner", "quantity": 16, "index": 42}, {"type": "leather", "quantity": 4, "index": 44}, {"type": "cooked_cod", "quantity": 63, "index": 45}]

thought: To craft a golden_shovel, I need to craft a gold_ingot first. To craft a gold_ingot, I need to smelt a gold_block in the furnace. Therefore, I will first move the gold_block from slot 28 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1
